title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 700.5 - Denial of access to records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 700.5 - Denial of access to records

State Regulations
(a) A
denial of access to records shall be in writing, state the reason therefor and
advise the requester of the right to appeal. (b) A failure to provide requested records
promptly, as described in section
700.3
(c) of this

Part, shall also be deemed a denial of access. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
700.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
